Define class FileChecking with attribute(s) and method(s). Check operations with configuration files.
class ats_utilities.config_io.base_check.FileChecking(verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Define class FileChecking with attribute(s) and method(s). Check operations with configuration files. It defines:

attributes:
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase.
MODES - Mode file operations.
file_path_ok - File exist, path ok.
file_mode_ok - Supported file mode.
file_format_ok - File format is (not) expected.
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor.
check_path - Check configuration file path.
check_mode - Check operation mode for configuration file.
check_format - Check configuration file format by extension.
is_file_ok - Status of configuration file.
MODES = ['r', 'w', 'a', 'b', 'x', 't', '+']¶
VERBOSE = 'ATS_UTILITIES::CONFIG_IO::FILE_CHECKING'¶
check_format(file_path, file_format, verbose=False)[source]¶

Check configuration file format by extension.

Parameters:
  • file_path (<str>) – Absolute configuration file path.
  • file_format (<str>) – File format (file extension).
  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/disable verbose option.
Exceptions:

None
check_mode(file_mode, verbose=False)[source]¶

Check operation mode for configuration file.

Parameters:
  • file_mode (<str>) – File mode (‘r’, ‘w’, ‘a’, ‘b’, ‘x’, ‘t’, ‘+’).
  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/disable verbose option.
Returns:

True (regular file mode) | False.
Return type:

<bool>
Exceptions:

None

Check configuration file path.

Parameters:
  • file_path (<str>) – Configuration file path.
  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/disable verbose option.

Status of configuration file.

Returns:True (correct file), else False.
